summary: This is a 2020 email chain discussing the inability to locate Volume I of a 2009 deposition transcript from a case involving Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes notes from a paralegal/investigator who attended the deposition, which describe the victim's vulnerability to Epstein's pattern of recruitment and grooming.

persons.name: Chris R. Rodgers
persons.context: Sends email forwarding a response about the inability to locate a deposition transcript and attaches notes from the deposition.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email regarding the missing deposition transcript.

persons.name: M. McCann
persons.context: Copied on the email about the missing deposition transcript.

persons.name: Wendy P. Calvet
persons.context: Copied on the email about the missing deposition transcript.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the missing 2009 deposition transcript; described as having a pattern of recruitment, grooming, and victimization of vulnerable young women.

connections.description: Rodgers emails Scarola regarding the status of locating a deposition transcript.
The deposition notes describe Epstein's pattern of recruitment, grooming, and victimization of a vulnerable young woman.

events.title: Deposition in case vs Epstein
events.description: A deposition was taken in a case against Jeffrey Epstein. The first volume of the transcript is missing.

events.title: Search for missing deposition transcript
events.description: A court reporting service confirms it is unable to locate Volume I of the 2009 deposition transcript.

events.title: Email forwarding search results
events.description: Chris R. Rodgers forwards the 'unable to locate' response and attaches deposition notes to Jack Scarola and others.

locations: 2139 Palm Beach Lakes Blvd, West Palm Beach, FL 33409
keyFacts: Volume I of a 2009 deposition transcript from a case against Jeffrey Epstein is missing and cannot be located by the court reporting service.
Detailed contemporaneous notes from a paralegal/investigator who attended the deposition are attached to the email.
The notes describe the victim as a 'troubled young woman' particularly susceptible to Epstein's pattern of recruitment, grooming, and victimization.
The email originates from the law firm Searcy Denney Scarola Barnhart & Shipley, P.A., indicating legal proceedings related to Epstein.
A video copy of the deposition is also confirmed to be no longer available.
